column1: How do your friends describe you?
I want to know people's intentions.
Yup. But I don't believe what people say.
It's easier if I tell people what to do.
Yes 'cuz people reveal their true selves when they're with me.
Yes! I want information to use against people!
How do you handle a problem?
I use my skills of observation and deduction.
I cut out the people from my life who are causing problems.
I solve the problems MY OWN way!
I manipulate people to solve my own problem.
I try to folow the best advice given at the time.
I don't solve them at all!
What's your goal when playing a game?
I'm not much into games... I'm too busy...
I wanna make the loser feel bad!!!! (hahaha)
If you were stuck in a closet who would you want to be with?
Not being able to see my parents!
